omg...u still have the wild haired saitoh XD XD that was probably my
favourite pic of Saitoh... ROFL yes i was going to draw an awake Saitoh
next...unfortunately he only appears like that ONCE in the entire PMK manga
>.< well, in all the chapters i have anyway...
maybe in burai the guys tie the hair into a bun when they go out to fight?
rofl Although i must say it's going to be hard fitting all that white hair
(who IS that guyanyway?) in a tiny bun...>.>
so, umm...a tiny request to everyone: if anybody has a pic of *awake* PMK
Saitoh, will you please email it to me? ^^;;; thanks a bunch!!!
